data.lyric:
[ti:A Thousand Bad Times (Explicit)]
[ar:Post Malone]
[al:Hollywood’s Bleeding (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]A Thousand Bad Times (Explicit) - Post Malone
[00:17.72]Said you needed a ride but you wanted my car
[00:21.10]Without that face girl you wouldn't get far
[00:24.08]I really like you despite who you are
[00:28.68]Who you are
[00:30.01]You see me on TV you know I'm a star
[00:33.07]You say you don't know me but I know that's false
[00:36.26]I'll pay the price girl whatever that cost
[00:41.86]You make my life so hard
[00:47.97]But that's what gets me off
[00:53.78]I had a thousand bad times
[00:55.63]So what's another time to me
[00:59.77]You try to burn my house down
[01:01.53]But what's another house to me
[01:05.79]Cuz I can take anything that you give me
[01:08.82]It's gonna take a lot more to kill me b***h
[01:12.22]So thank you for the grave
[01:13.73]I needed me a place to sleep
[01:17.26]And I don't wanna meet your mama
[01:20.01]She probably crazier than you
[01:23.15]I'm gonna need some thicker armor
[01:26.27]To spend another knight with you
[01:30.18]Baby I know just what to do
[01:33.24]Everytime you f**k me over I'll come back to you
[01:36.23]Baby I don't wanna know the truth
[01:39.18]I ignore them when they tell me all the s**t you do
[01:41.89]I always get my heart broke like I needed the practice
[01:45.60]Foot on my throat 'til' my world is collapsin'
[01:48.35]But this what I chose
[01:49.74]It's the law of attraction yeah
[01:54.32]You make my life so hard
[02:00.28]But that's what gets me off
[02:06.16]I had a thousand bad times
[02:08.11]So what's another time to me
[02:12.24]You try to burn my house down
[02:14.09]But what's another house to me
[02:18.21]Cuz I can take anything that you give me
[02:21.25]It's gonna take a lot more to kill me b***h
[02:24.76]So thank you for the grave
[02:26.24]I needed me a place to sleep
[02:30.83]I should get out
[02:33.99]But I still want more
[02:36.98]I should get out
[02:39.96]What am I waiting for
[02:44.25]It's all the same to me
[02:47.32]It's all a game to me
[02:50.32]It's all the same to me
[02:53.27]It's all the same
[02:56.78]I had a thousand bad times
[02:58.62]So what's another time to me
[03:02.80]You try to burn my house down
[03:04.63]But what's another house to me
[03:08.90]Cuz I can take anything that you give me
[03:11.80]It's gonna take a lot more to kill me b***h
[03:15.24]So thank you for the grave
[03:16.82]I needed me a place to sleep
data.trans:
[ti:A Thousand Bad Times (Explicit)]
[ar:Post Malone]
[al:Hollywoodâ€™s Bleeding (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:17.72]你说你只想搭个便车 但你其实想占有我的车
[00:21.10]要是没有那张脸 姑娘 你就走不了多远
[00:24.08]我真的喜欢你 不管你是谁
[00:28.68]你是谁
[00:30.01]你在电视上看到我 你知道我是个明星
[00:33.07]你说你不认识我 但我知道你撒谎
[00:36.26]我会为你买单的 姑娘 不管多少钱
[00:41.86]你让我的人生变得好难
[00:47.97]但正因如此 我感到很兴奋
[00:53.78]我经历了无数坎坷
[00:55.63]再经历一次又何妨
[00:59.77]你想要摧毁我的房子
[01:01.53]但是再买一套又何妨
[01:05.79]因为我能承受你给我的所有痛苦
[01:08.82]想要毁灭我 可没那么容易 碧池
[01:12.22]所以 谢谢你帮我挖掘坟墓
[01:13.73]我正好需要一个地方睡觉
[01:17.26]我不想见你的妈妈
[01:20.01]她可能比你更疯狂
[01:23.15]我可能需要更坚硬的铠甲
[01:26.27]才能和你度过另一个夜晚
[01:30.18]宝贝 我知道怎么做
[01:33.24]每次你伤害了我 我都会回到你身边
[01:36.23]宝贝 我不想知道真相
[01:39.18]当他们告诉我你的所作所为 我选择充耳不闻
[01:41.89]我反复让我的心支离破碎 似乎我想将它训练得更加强大
[01:45.60]我被你控制 直到我的世界崩塌为止
[01:48.35]但这是我自己选的
[01:49.74]这就是吸引力法则
[01:54.32]你让我的人生变得好难
[02:00.28]但正因如此 我感到很兴奋
[02:06.16]我经历了无数坎坷
[02:08.11]再经历一次又何妨
[02:12.24]你想要摧毁我的房子
[02:14.09]但是再买一套又何妨
[02:18.21]因为我能承受你给我的所有痛苦
[02:21.25]想要毁灭我 可没那么容易 碧池
[02:24.76]所以 谢谢你帮我挖掘坟墓
[02:26.24]我正好需要一个地方睡觉
[02:30.83]我应该抽离其中
[02:33.99]但我还是不满足
[02:36.98]我应该抽离其中
[02:39.96]我在等什么
[02:44.25]对我来说都一样
[02:47.32]对我来说都是游戏而已
[02:50.32]对我来说都一样
[02:53.27]都一样
[02:56.78]我经历了无数坎坷
[02:58.62]再经历一次又何妨
[03:02.80]你想要摧毁我的房子
[03:04.63]但是再买一套又何妨
[03:08.90]因为我能承受你给我的所有痛苦
[03:11.80]想要毁灭我 可没那么容易 碧池
[03:15.24]所以 谢谢你帮我挖掘坟墓
[03:16.82]我正好需要一个地方睡觉
